message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14000. This is a high-quality item that I believe would be of great value to you, considering its worth of $12000 to you. Let's discuss how we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I've done some research and I believe that's a fair price for this product.
